editor.uploadTips: Drag the file here or click upload
editor.uploadMessage: Tips: All users can access this wallpaper. Please do not upload wallpapers that are illegal, pornographic, violent, or sexually suggestive, or wallpapers that contain personal privacy. Please do not upload duplicate or low-quality wallpapers, they may be deleted by the administrator.
editor.loadlUploadTips: Drag in files or manually select files
editor.localUploadMessage: Tips: The wallpaper here is only used on your local machine and will not be uploaded to the server.
